stringified:
Last Index Of | string,searchValue,fromIndex | value | IMPLICIT | NONE
({ string, searchValue, fromIndex }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.lastIndexOf(searchValue, fromIndex))

original.description: Returns the index within the calling String object of the last occurrence of the specified value, or -1 if not found. The calling string is searched backward, starting at fromIndex

alternativeFunction: function ({ inputString, searchValue, fromIndex }, { lastIndex }) { lastIndex.next(inputString.lastIndexOf(searchValue, fromIndex)); }
alternativeMetaData: Last Position Of | inputString, searchValue, fromIndex | lastIndex | IMPLICIT | NONE
prompts: Find last index of substring in string
Find the last position of a substring in a string
